data.persona: I am a farmer. I grow crops on my land. I like to work with my hands. I get up early, and go to bed very late.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The old rustic barn was settled on the outermost edge of the farm.  Standing tall over the fields, this two-story red barn cast a long shadow over the field surrounding it.  Large wooden doors that could be propped open with great effort would lead you directly inside.
There's a feed, a door, a Tack for the work horses, and a pitchforks and scythes here.
The peasant and the thief are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a hoe for digging.

            "desc": "I am a poor humble peasant.  I have spent my whole life toiling from dawn to dusk to till the land of my lord.  My back aches and my knees have little bend left in them. data.short_motivation: I need to follow the thief so I can find where the thief hid the stolen goods.
data.mid_motivation: I have noticed that some of my tools and crops are missing and need to find the thief.
data.long_motivation: I will take good care of my crops so that they grow healthy and  I can earn money selling them off.
